VRDisplayDisplayName.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The displayName read-only property of the interface returns a human-readable name to identify the VRDisplay.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This will generally be something like "Oculus VR HMD (HMD)" or "Oculus VR HMD (Sensor)".

VRDisplayDisplayName.value: A string containing the human-readable name of the specific VR display.
